name: eldritch_moon
description: A very large Eldritch Moon–themed package including Emerge, Meld, Escalate, Skulk, Delirium, Madness, Investigate, transform-style triggers, and Eldrazi Horror token synergies.

Creature: {TRIGGER_INTRO}create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
{CARDNAME} has skulk. (It can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
{TRIGGER_INTRO}target creature gets {PUMP_PT} until end of turn.
Madness {MADNESS_COST} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Emerge {EMERGE_COST} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)
{TRIGGER_INTRO}each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {C}. Delirium — {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

ACTIVATED_COST: Exile a card from your graveyard
TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your end step,
Whenever a creature you control dies,
Whenever you cast a creature spell,
CLUE_SENTENCE: Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Create a Clue token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
ELDRAZI_TOKEN_SENTENCE: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.
Create two 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature tokens.
Put a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token onto the battlefield tapped.
GRAVEYARD_ACTION: return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand
exile target card from a graveyard
put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard
TRANSFORM_TRIGGER: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform {CARDNAME}.
At the beginning of each end step, if you control no other creatures, transform {CARDNAME}.
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, you may transform {CARDNAME}.
DELIRIUM_EFFECT: {CARDNAME} gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
As long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, {CARDNAME} has menace.
As long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, {CARDNAME} has flying.
If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, draw a card.
